title: Kinda Funny vs. The World (Live Action) - Let's Play Live! Trailer (4K)
description:
Get your tickets at http://RoosterTeethLive.com

Use code FUNNY to show that the Best Friends are better than Achievement Hunter, Funhaus, ScrewAttack, and The Creatures! 


Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1



Watch the other versions of this video!
Achievement Hunter: https://youtu.be/s_iXOHVcSU8
Funhaus: https://youtu.be/pIUj0CpDn7A
ScrewAttack: https://youtu.be/RGmwsiuVGEQ
The Creatures: https://youtu.be/l5bHEico7dM


Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Colin - http://www.twitter.com/NoTaxation
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

transcript_chunks.text: where the hell is this Starbucks we've been walking for 45 minutes? Yeah, Nick, I thought you said this was a shortcut. Fantastic. Was it a shortcut or not? Okay, look who it is. Kinda lame. My, well, well, well, if it isn't the Sony **** themselves. Kinda Funny, you **** right off, Creatures. Hey, IGN called, they want to know what it's like taking money from children from your **** up apartment. I do miss the IGN offices. Nick, get back over here. We've taken enough of your ****. Creatures, this ends right here, right now. Let's dance. You want to dance, Greg, cuz I want a Tango. Let's do this. Looks like we got some **** about to fight. Too bad Achievement Hunters here to kill you all. All right, oh, you didn't think you'd have a death battle without ScrewAttack, did you? Let's Play Live at the Doe theater in Los Angeles, June 17th at 7:30 p.m. Go to Rooster Teeth live.com and enter code funny.
